items.title: Trump hits India with extra 25% tariff for buying Russian oil
items.description: This will bring the tariff rate on India to 50%, among the highest rates imposed by the US.

items.title: Kremlin says US-Russia talks were 'constructive' as ceasefire deadline looms
items.description: Despite President Trump's threat of sweeping sanctions, expectations for a ceasefire between Moscow and Kyiv are muted.

items.title: Nigeria seizes 1,600 birds in 'largest' wildlife-trafficking bust
items.description: Nigeria's customs agency says wildlife trafficking is "frequent" in the country.

items.title: One dead and thousands evacuated as wildfire spreads in France
items.description: The wildfire is the largest in France this year and has burned some 12,000 hectares of land, an area larger than Paris.

items.title: Ghanaian star Shatta Wale's luxury car surrendered over alleged link to US crime
items.description: Shatta Wale criticises the authorities the seizure of his car and says he is unaware of its link to crime.
